entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NewlyCreatedProjectsFromDotNetNew.ValidateCSharpTemplateProjects is flakey #74157
  • Can only build Roslyn.sln a single time before building breaks (2) #74156
  • Building Roslyn.sln does not deploy servicehub binaries properly., #74155
  • Incremental builds are broken in Roslyn.sln. #74154
  • Can only build Roslyn.sln a single time before building breaks. #74153
  • Unable to resolve symbols when additional metadata references are added to the project compilation #74148
  • Conversions to restricted types are not disallowed in expression trees #74143
  • Refactoring IDE0053 with preprocessor directives breaks compilation #74137
    Backlog
  • Enable R2R of Interactive Host assemblies once API Scan support is implemented #74135
    17.11

Closed

  • VS cant format #74142
  • Static interface methods with a default implementation should be visible on the derived type. #74138
  • RegexGenerator throwing error CS0165: Use of unassigned local variable. #74133

PullRequests

Created

  • EnumerableConditionalWeakTable and WeakEvent #74160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove GetTempPath copy #74159
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • 17.11: Add weak heuristics in our designer scanning code to improve experience during things like configuration switch. #74152
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Better detect equivalence in our strong name provider #74151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • UI improvements for the Copilot rename feature #74149
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix 'invert if' refactor to properly enclose #region/#endregion blocks #74145
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce time spent in ConflictResolver.Session.GetNodesOrTokensToCheckForConflicts #74101
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support navigating to an interceptor location when on an intercepted method call. #74006
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disabling flakey test #74158
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Handle unspecified anonymous type property in VisualBasicOperationFactory #74091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74150
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Enable some type test scenarios involving ref like type parameters #74102
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2482061 #74144
    auto-merge
  • Mark partial properties feature as shipped #74147
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Add overload resolution priority status #74128
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Temporarily disable R2R #74136
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74146
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Make sure task completes on exception path #74106
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Snap 17.11P3 #74141
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update config for snap #74119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Reduce allocations in AbstractProjectExtensionProvider.FilterExtensions #74112
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid re-running all codeaction requests at low priority. #74083
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add weak heuristics in our designer scanning code to improve experience during things like configuration switch. #74130
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure an empty run result doesn't throw when generators are present. #74034
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, 17.11
  • Avoid span conversion in delegate extension receiver #74044
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Remove semantic model keep-alive code in completion #73844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #74002
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Do not store temp of ref conditional operator by value #74116
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Move PEPropertySymbol to use the same UncommonFields pattern that PEMethodSymbol uses #74132
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Preserve trivia for 'Use Collection Expression' fixer in more cases #74052
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix error recovery for various nested conversion scenarios #74089
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use ITextDifferencingService.DiffSnapshotSpans instead of allocating full buffer text during codeaction previews #74114
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle early attribute required members cycle #74110
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add fallback options to solution snapshot #74038
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74129
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Disable targeted notifications in integration tests #73987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Escaping also considers record structs #74125
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Parse `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove copilot analysis code #74111
    Area-IDE, untriaged
